item.title: Okta’s earnings show the company is benefiting from the ‘identity quagmire’ of AI

item.title: ‘The money went into his account’: Is my father trying to swindle me out of my grandparents’ $800K home?
item.description: “I came across a letter from my father’s bank showing a wire transfer of $195,000 from the buyer.”

item.title: You know what’s not tariff-proof? Your kid’s peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Here’s why.

item.title: Regional-bank stocks are catching up to larger rivals. How to play the sector from here.
item.description: A KBW analyst still prefers big banks over regional names, but sees opportunities for investors who want to chase the rally in smaller bank stocks.
